title: [BUG] SkBitmap.Decode always fail some images
body:
**Description**

I am trying to load images in Windows using the following code but it is failing consistently for some of the images.

**Code**

         using (var input = File.OpenRead(imageFileName))
                {
                    using (SKManagedStream inputStream = new SKManagedStream(input))
                    {
                        skBitmap = SKBitmap.Decode(inputStream);
                    }
                }

**Expected Behavior**

Should not return null

**Actual Behavior**


**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.3
- Last known good version:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE: Visual Studio Code
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Windows Classic:  10
- Target Devices:

  <summary>Detailed IDE/OS information (click to expand)</summary>

</details>
